title: SCS CSD 301-DL-62 Anatomy and Physiology of the Vocal Mechanism

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course covers anatomical and physiological mechanisms of breathing, phonation and articulation. Laboratories include dissection and participation in physiological research. The course is conducted completely online. It will be asynchronous; students can participate in discussions and complete assignments by working at their own pace, as long as deadlines are met.

subject: CSD
